commands.name: az pipelines variable create
commands.summary: Add a variable to a pipeline.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable create --name
                             [--allow-override {false, true}]
                             [--detect {false, true}]
                             [--org]
                             [--pipeline-id]
                             [--pipeline-name]
                             [--project]
                             [--secret {false, true}]
                             [--value]

commands.name: az pipelines variable list
commands.summary: List the variables in a pipeline.

commands.name: az pipelines variable update
commands.summary: Update a variable in a pipeline.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines variable update --name
                             [--allow-override {false, true}]
                             [--detect {false, true}]
                             [--new-name]
                             [--org]
                             [--pipeline-id]
                             [--pipeline-name]
                             [--project]
                             [--prompt-value {false, true}]
                             [--secret {false, true}]
                             [--value]
